io.github.hapjava.accessories.HomekitAccessory

  • Packages that use HomekitAccessory 
    Package Description
    io.github.hapjava.accessories
    Contains interfaces that can be implemented to represent an exposed accessory.
    io.github.hapjava.services.impl
